said he has spoken to Eagles quarterback Michael Vick several times in the past few weeks. Michael Vick was reinstated during the 2009 season after spending 18 months in prison on federal charges of running a dogfighting ring. He's paid a very significant price and he's doing the right thing, Roger Goodell said. ''I don't want him to put himself in a position where bad things can happen around him. He takes that seriously.
